sentences: Lõpmatus universumis tiirleb päikese kollane kera oma salapärasel orbiidil.
context: The Estonian word 'universum' refers to the entire cosmos - all of space, time, matter and energy that exists. It is used in cosmology as the object of study, encompassing everything from stars and galaxies to the physical laws governing them. The word follows standard Estonian declension patterns with '-i' and '-it' endings in different forms.
